response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and utility, the product is valued at $1,200,000 by you. However, considering the current market conditions and strategic alignment, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this valuable asset for $950,000. This special price is designed to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while also maximizing my return on investment. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you require any additional information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 950000}
